item.title: Shape your elevator pitch (Networking Series Part 5)
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: Your elevator pitch, that is the way you’re introducing yourself, should be something you’re working on constantly. Elevator pitch One of the most important ways to brand yourself and let people know what you do is your elevator pitch. So how do you make sure you can get your message across the right way? How can you startÂ raking in those requests to be hired by the right people you can help best?
